# NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType

**Enumeration**

Types of browser column resizing.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ColumnResizingType
```

## Overview

These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowser/columnResizingType-swift.property] methods.

## Constants

- **NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType.noColumnResizing**
- **NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType.autoColumnResizing**
- **NSBrowser.ColumnResizingType.userColumnResizing**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSBrowser.DropOperation**: The type used to specify the drop type of a drag-and-drop operation. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowserDelegate/browser(_:validateDrop:proposedRow:column:dropOperation:)] for more information.
- **Application Kit Versions for NSBrowser Functionality**: The version of the AppKit.framework containing a specific bug fix or capability.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
